title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 16:10  
tmortagne1 joined #xwiki at 16:34  
tmortagne left at 16:34 (Read error: No route to host  
sburjan - (16:35): cjdelisle, : there is still work to be done with action menus  
cjdelisle - (16:38): I see. It would be really cool if it used css z-index so it worked without javascript but I will hold my toung since I'm not working on it ;)  
sburjan - (16:41): but you can propose that if it's possible  
sburjan - (16:41): silvia found some bugs too on IE browsers  
sburjan - (16:41): like it is actually using z-index  
sburjan - (16:41): i'll investigate more tomorrow  
sburjan - (16:41): going home :)  
sburjan - (16:42): do you still need the error stack from yesterday or you solved the problem ?  
cjdelisle - (16:42): See ya.  
cjdelisle - (16:42): I think it's fixed, I couldn't reproduce it.  
cjdelisle - (16:42): (since patching)  
sburjan - (16:42): good  
sburjan - (16:42): talk a little bit laters :)  
sburjan - (16:42): peace  
sburjan left at 16:48 (Ping timeout: 276 seconds  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 16:58  
lpereira left at 16:58 (Quit: Leaving.  
vmassol left at 17:07 (Quit: Leaving.  
tmortagne joined #xwiki at 17:22  
tmortagne1 left at 17:22 (Read error: Connection reset by peer  
sburjan` - (17:27): I mark myself as back :)  
cjdelisle - (17:29): When I /away, does that spam the channel with the "have been marked as being away" message?  
lucaa left at 17:29 (Ping timeout: 258 seconds  
sburjan` - (17:30): depends on the IRC client  
sburjan` - (17:30): what are you using ?  
sburjan` - (17:31): but you can try :)  
sburjan` - (17:31): sdumitriu won't ban you  
cjdelisle - (17:34): I just did and you didn't see it so apparently it doesn't.  
cjdelisle - (17:35): I ask because it writes a line into the channel for me.  
sburjan` - (17:37): well ... you can set your client for silent away  
sburjan` - (17:38): it can set on all channels, or only on the channel youissue the command to, and on the rest to set away  
sburjan` - (17:38): xchat, irssi or BitchX ?  
sburjan` - (17:38): xchat surely has option for silent  
cjdelisle - (17:39): xchat. It wouldn't notice me in the channel bit I closed the freenode window so it can't notice me there anymore.  
sburjan` - (17:40): i think notce windows will be re-opened  
cjdelisle - (17:46): http://green.autoblog.com/2010/08/26/autobloggreen-qanda-with-transonic-combustion-can-supercritical-f/ Finally somebody developing a high efficiency engine.
